name: Hidden Files Toogle for Mac
tagline: Switcher hidden files for Mac OSX Finder.
body: # Hidden Files Toogle for Mac OSX Finder Switcher hidden files for Mac OSX Finder. Download the last program executable here: https://github.com/danilogcarolino/HiddenFilesToogleForMac/releases/download/1.0/hiddenfiles OR Build the program: gcc -Wall -g main.c -o hiddenfiles Move the binary to the local bin directory: mv hiddenfiles /usr/local/bin Use the command - OSX terminal: hiddenfiles on | off or hiddenfiles true | false Change the execution permission (if necessary): chmod u+x hiddenfiles The program will only run the appropriate command in background to show or hide your hidden system files. Enjoy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
